alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:42PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lander County through 115 PM PDT... At 1242 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Grass Valley, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Lander County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
